members.signatureBeforeChange: public SystemErrLog(Predicate2<? super Thread, ? super StackTraceElement> filter)
members.signatureAfterChange: public SystemErrLog(Predicate2<? super Thread, ? super StackTraceElement> filter)
diff: -  /** Create a log to {@code System.err} with the given filter */
+  /** Create a log to {@code System.err} with the given filter, using the platform's default charset. */
-  /** Create a log to {@code System.out} without filtering */
+  /** Create a log to {@code System.out} without filtering, using the platform's default charset. */
+    // binding to System.out is delayed to be thread safe (using "System.out" both in the super call
+    // and the field initialization raises the possibility that its value changes in between the two refs)
-  /** Create a log to {@code System.err} without filtering */
+  /** Create a log to {@code System.err} without filtering, using the platform's default charset. */
+    // binding to System.err is delayed to be thread safe (using "System.err" both in the super call
+    // and the field initialization raises the possibility that its value changes in between the two refs)

members.signatureBeforeChange: public SystemOutLog(Predicate2<? super Thread, ? super StackTraceElement> filter)
members.signatureAfterChange: public SystemOutLog(Predicate2<? super Thread, ? super StackTraceElement> filter)
diff: -  /** Create a log to {@code System.out} with the given filter */
+  /** Create a log to {@code System.out} with the given filter, using the platform's default charset. */
